member.name: T:SetStartupProjects.SolutionProjectExtractor
member.summary: Helper that extracts all the project paths and guids from a solution.

member.name: T:SetStartupProjects.StartProjectFinder
member.summary:
Helper class for extracting Visual Studio startup projects by looking at the projects contained in the solution directory and allplying some conventions.
The current conventions are as follows:
'StartAction' is 'Program'.
'OutputType' is 'Exe'.
'OutputType' is 'WinExe'.
Project extension is `ccproj` ie an Azure Cloud Service.
Project type is 'ASP.NET MVC 1.0' ie '603C0E0B-DB56-11DC-BE95-000D561079B0'.
Project type is 'ASP.NET MVC 2.0' ie 'F85E285D-A4E0-4152-9332-AB1D724D3325'.
Project type is 'ASP.NET MVC 3.0' ie 'E53F8FEA-EAE0-44A6-8774-FFD645390401'.
Project type is 'ASP.NET MVC 4.0' ie 'E3E379DF-F4C6-4180-9B81-6769533ABE47'.
Project type is 'Web Application' ie '349C5851-65DF-11DA-9384-00065B846F21'.
Project type is 'Web Site' ie 'E24C65DC-7377-472B-9ABA-BC803B73C61A'.

member.name: M:SetStartupProjects.StartProjectFinder.GetStartProjects(System.String)
member.summary: Get the startup projects by looking at the projects contained in .

member.name: T:SetStartupProjects.StartProjectSuoCreator
member.summary: Creates suo files that contain startup projects.

member.name: M:SetStartupProjects.StartProjectSuoCreator.CreateForSolutionFile(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},SetStartupProjects.VisualStudioVersions)
member.summary: Create suo startup files for a specific solution file.
member.remarks: All existing suo files will be overwritten.

member.name: T:SetStartupProjects.VisualStudioVersions
